ADLODPerformanceLevels Struct Reference

Structure containing information about Overdrive performance levels. More...

Data Fields

int iSize
 Must be set to sizeof( ADLODPerformanceLevels ) + sizeof( ADLODPerformanceLevel ) * (ADLODParameters.iNumberOfPerformanceLevels - 1).
int iReserved
ADLODPerformanceLevel aLevels [1]
 Array of performance state descriptors. Must have ADLODParameters.iNumberOfPerformanceLevels elements.

Detailed Description

Structure containing information about Overdrive performance levels.

This structure is used to store information about Overdrive performance levels. This structure is used by the ADL_Overdrive5_ODPerformanceLevels_Get() and ADL_Overdrive5_ODPerformanceLevels_Set() functions.

Field Documentation

int ADLODPerformanceLevels::iSize

Must be set to sizeof( ADLODPerformanceLevels ) + sizeof( ADLODPerformanceLevel ) * (ADLODParameters.iNumberOfPerformanceLevels - 1).

int ADLODPerformanceLevels::iReserved
ADLODPerformanceLevel ADLODPerformanceLevels::aLevels[1]

Array of performance state descriptors. Must have ADLODParameters.iNumberOfPerformanceLevels elements.
